briefTitle: Promoting Resilience in Women with Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Promoting Resilience in Women with Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Promoting Resilience in Women with Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* women undergoing neoadjuvant chemotherapy with early-stage breast cancer, women undergoing treatment for metastatic breast cancer

Exclusion Criteria:

* patients who do not speak English
